children: Tatrāyaṃ anupubbikathā – sākiyakoliyā kira kapilavatthunagarassa ca koliyanagarassa ca antare rohiṇiṃ nāma nadiṃ ekeneva āvaraṇena bandhāpetvā sassāni karonti, atha jeṭṭhamūlamāse sassesu milāyantesu ubhayanagaravāsikānampi kammakarā sannipatiṃsu. children: Rājāno

pasannā – ‘‘sace satthā nāgamissa, mayaṃ sahatthā aññamaññaṃyeva vadhitvā lohitanadiṃ pavattayissāma, amhākaṃ puttabhātaro gehadvāre na passeyyāma, sāsanapaṭisāsanampi no āharaṇako na bhavissati. Satthāraṃ nissāya no jīvitaṃ laddhaṃ. Sace pana satthā agāraṃ ajjhāvasissa, dvisahassadīpaparivāresu catūsu mahādīpesu rajjamassa hatthagataṃ abhavissa, atirekasahassaṃ kho panassa puttā abhavissaṃsu, tato khattiyaparivārova avicarissa. Taṃ kho panesa sampattiṃ pahāya nikkhamitvā sambodhiṃ patto, idānipi khattiyaparivāroyeva vicaratū’’ti ubhayanagaravāsino aḍḍhatiyāni aḍḍhatiyāni kumārasatāni adaṃsu. Bhagavā te pabbājetvā mahāvanaṃ agamāsi. Tesaṃ garugāravavasena na attano ruciyā pabbajitānaṃ anabhirati uppajji.
